price: (54) Whether you reveal a thing or conceal it, indeed Allāh is ever, of all things, Knowing.
arabic: إِن تُبۡدُواْ شَيۡـًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: in tub'dū shayan aw tukh'fūhu fa-inna al-laha kāna bikulli shayin ʿalīman
